comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: (December 19, 1911–April 20, 1966) was the 4th son of Crown Prince Wilhelm of Germany and Duchess Cecilie of Mecklenburg-Schwerin. Prince Friedrich died in 1966 at Reinhartshausen, Germany after drowning in the Rhine. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prince_Frederick_of_Prussia
